changelog:
Changelog for Version 1.6:
- Bug fixes & UI improvements
- Made the Settings screen simpler and easier to use.
- Fixed spoilers to show content when clicked
Feature
- Added fun animations to some screens.
- Added Bookmarks and forum search to find posts easily.
- Included shortcuts to jump to subforums quickly.
- Added swipe left/right to move between pages.
- Added dividers and a dynamic theme (Android 12 and up)
